text: Enzo Nahuel Copetti (born 16 January 1996) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Primera B Nacional side Atlético de Rafaela. ==Career== Copetti began in the youth of Atlético de Rafaela before making the step up into senior football in 2016, he made his first-team debut on 2 June 2016 in a Copa Argentina match against Ferro Carril Oeste. In April 2017, Copetti made his first appearance in the Argentine Primera División against Huracán.
